entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revisit code that updates loops before block removal #68844
  • CancellationTokenSource.CancelAfter(TimeSpan delay) throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException for valid TimeSpan values #68841
  • SetYieldProcessorScalingFactor needs to change to adapt to the new periodical measurements #68839
    7.0.0
  • JIT Stress: Assertions on Arm32 #68837
  • Incorrect enum value for cordebug CorGCReferenceType #68836
  • [API Proposal]: System.Threading.ThreadLocal<T> ClearValues method #68832
  • Serialization issue in .NET 6 Blazor after publishing #68826
  • Assert: ThreadBaseExceptionFilter_Worker called in no-throw context #68819
  • [Perf] Regressions in Vector Equals #68820
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Base64 #68821
  • [Perf] Regressions in BenchmarksGame.FannkuchRedux_5 #68822
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Net.Http.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerPerfTest #68824
  • ucol_safeClone deprecated in ICU 71.1 #68814
    7.0.0
  • Test failed on powerpc "System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexCultureTests.TurkishI_Is_Differently_LowerUpperCased_In_Turkish_Culture" #68812
  • [API Proposal]: ToDictionary / ToImmutableDictionary for ValueTuple<K,V> #68811
  • STJ source generation fails to compile without referencing the STJ package #68810
  • [net6][iOS] `Ran out of trampolines of type 1` running on x64 simulator #68808
  • Stack overflow due to recursion in WebAssembly produces assertion failure #68798
  • Span<T> wrapped in a struct isn't performing as fast as it could be #68797

Closed

  • .Net6 Core inconsistent/breaking change for StartsWith #68829
  • GetProcessesByName_NullEmpty_ReturnsAllProcesses fails on Android #68838
  • usersecrets are not accessible inside container for worker service project #36062
    7.0.0
  • ZipArchive corrupts files with unicode characters #65750
    7.0.0
  • `Stream.ReadByte` should use `stackalloc byte[1]` instead allocate one byte array #68800
  • [HTTP/3] SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits(streamLimit: 10) fails #55901
    Future
  • System.Net.Security test run killed on Mono Linux #56478
    7.0.0
  • Test failure ThresholdExceeded_ThrowsException #57991
    Future
  • Test failure GetAsync_SetAutomaticDecompression_ContentDecompressed_Deflate #58018
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: SendReceive_Concurrent_Success #58347
    Future
  • DateTime.Now from .NET 6 will return UTC time, not local time in docker engine on CentOS #68759
  • Task.Delay actual accepted delay is twice the documented value #68818
  • Assertion failed 'vecCns.i32[argIdx] == 0' in 'System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector128Tests:Vector128SingleShuffleOneInputTest():this' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #68815
    7.0.0
  • JIT: force assert for noway during SPMI replay #68781
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tests.PeriodicTimerTests.PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted failing in CI #59542
    7.0.0
  • Consider defaulting AltJIT to all ISAs enabled #41518
    Future
  • EnvelopedCms Decryption of binary data corrupts response on Linux if unencrypted data starts with byte value 0x04 #68554
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests failed #59926
    7.0.0
  • Support backing the allocation of a string by user controlled memory #49976
    Future
  • .NET dependencies? #68794
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.OSSupportTest.IOControl_SIOCATMARK_Unix_Success test failure on macOS #50748
    Future
  • Wasm Browser work items failing with OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException #44862
    7.0.0
  • Segfault during restore: CoreCLR Product Build Linux_musl arm release #43826
    7.0.0
  • AssemblyBuilder.GetDynamicModule does not return previously created dynamic modules #57130
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor tweaks to host tracing around registered install location #68843
    area-Host
  • Move `CustomTypeMarshaller` APIs to `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling` #68842
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a few more API compat inconsistencies #68834
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Throw from MsQuicImplementationProvider if not supported. #68833
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use switch over a span in a few more places #68831
    area-System.Security
  • Replace invalid sourcegen debug assertion with runtime check #68828
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Perf Update framework var name #68827
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • add architecture enum PPC64le #68809
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • ppc64le build support #68806
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Reset the bbNatLoopNum of block for removed loop #68804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle case to update loop tables when preheader is removed #68803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] add support to build for ppc64le architecture #68802
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono][wasm] Pin corlib exceptions after creation. #68801
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Tweak Rune.DecodeFromUtf8 #68799
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Improving the 64-bit number formatting to better match the 32-bit algorithm #68795
    area-System.Numerics

Merged

  • Disable profiler multiple test against JIT and GC stress runs #68501
    test-bug, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix the logic for regions detection #67995
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Update branding to 6.0.6 #68825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • regenerate networking ref assemblies #68630
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable a few tests on mobile #68830
  • Enable PGO with cross compilation #68813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable win-arm64 runtime tests on PRs for CoreCLR #68627
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure that Arm64 always sets the VectorTableLookup type for shuffle to be `byte` or `sbyte` #68817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: update `NO_WAY` assert, fix issue it was hiding #68796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a document describing how to triage CI test failures #68682
  • Add document describing how to disable tests #68727
  • Do not save/restore upper vector for blocks that will always return #68793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted test #68805
    area-System.Threading
  • Ensure that InstructionSetFlags are correctly fixed up for unmatched VM #64158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove unwrapping of OCTET STRING wrapping in EnvelopedCms. #68562
    area-System.Security, breaking-change
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #67419
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Mitigate stress hangs by marking GC-sensitive tests as out-of-proc #68733
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid string-related allocation from GetCSharpString in XML serializer #68738
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [System.Native] (wasm) use a temporary buffer if threading is used #68784
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Update arm/arm64 Linux cross build images #68561
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [Mono]: Fix static closed delegate fnptr crash. #68701
    area-Interop-mono
  • Regenerate fabricbot config to include several new/revised automation tasks #68728
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Delete unmanaged AssemblyName parser #68737
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove REGEX_OPTIONS from TextFieldParser.vb #68766
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Revise OSR docs #68778
  • Update comments and simplify implementation of ResourceManager.IsDefault #68777
    area-System.Resources

Updated

  • Fix singlefile on OSX ARM64 #68845
    area-Single-File
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update iOS result and post command #68788
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Use x64 directory if running x64 process on arm64 apphost #68583
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, needs-author-action, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #67901
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, needs-author-action, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    area-System.Console, 6.0.x
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [WIP] wasm app host #68696
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Build improvements #64938
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] backports #67763: fix build with musl 1.2.3 #68121
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve rendering of some negated sets #68608
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix a few TODOs in regex #68679
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Add SlidingWindow and FixedWindow to RateLimitPartition #68782
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Added the fix to make use of the heap hard limit instead of the region range while using large pages. #68629
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve impPopCallArgs #68736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Dynamically sized stacks in EventPipe buffer manager #68134
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #68050
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.6
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add UseSystemd() and UseWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/6.0] Unloadability bugs fixes #68674
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove some unnecessary StringBuilder use #68768
    area-Meta
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [debugger] Fix debugging wasm sample #68421
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • 49936 text json failures #68758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add leg to build wasm with threading enabled #68787
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Confusing error message when invalid target frameworks are specified #25191

PullRequests

Created

  • Next two test projects to move to helix #25197
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update build.yml to target loc build at 6.0.4xx #25195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #25192
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25181
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix MSI workload garbage collection #25155
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3xx
  • Update branding to 6.0.301 #25190
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Next helix test move #25057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.420 #25188
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.106 #25189
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Port changes from Main for fixing binary version issues. #25087
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Version updates for compliance checks #25103
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port changes from Main for fixing binary version issues. #25104
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25130
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use System.Environment to obtain user HOME dir #25117
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Certain intermixes of braceless and braced usings seems to result in unbalanced try/finally sequence points #61119
    17.3
  • Use Site Diagnostics are missed in tuple symbols in VB #61112
  • Infer indentation for documents that are not open #61109

Closed

  • CS0539 implementing interface method with T? explicitly #61116
  • Description of code fix for "unnecessary assignment" is misleading when the variable is removed #40002
    Backlog
  • Differences detected in solution checksum in integration tests #57324
    17.3
  • Provide a way to efficiently get the list of global aliases in a compilation. #59088
    Backlog
  • Factor out SCI/SRM insertions #39551
  • investigate failing OptProf Tests #33180
    Backlog
  • Improve and automate optprof data collection for Roslyn assemblies #21850
    Backlog
  • Jitting in InlineRenameSession.ApplyReplacements and InitializeOpenBuffers #19704
    Backlog
  • InvalidProgramException: Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program. #61055
  • Unskip CSharpQuickInfo tests when integration machines are updated #53979
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61117
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix F# smart indentation #61115
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part2). #61111
    Area-IDE
  • Use auto-properties for PropertyOverrides #61107
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Inline the Inheritance Margin template selector #61106
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part1). #60036
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use property pattern #61062
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61118
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Backport build yml and publishing script changes #61043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Tools|Options code ordering to match waht is in the UI #61110
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify initialization logic #61100
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use correct directory for loghub logs #61104
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Move usings on paste off the UI thread #61092
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Create shared helper to handle finding extensions in analyzer references #61108
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable semantic token LSP integration tests + re-enable quick info tests #61098
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Simplify common CWT pattern #61099
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61101
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61102
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61103
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61085
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initializer #61040
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type #60924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, 17.3
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebApi: adding ApiVersioning removes numbers from end of controller name #41502
  • Perf regression: mapaction #41498
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_actix #41497
  • Create new Web API using `dotnet new webapi` with use-minimal-apis and use-program-main options set, you get a warning on build #41491
    7.0-preview5
  • Large byte array Blazor and JS interop #41490
  • Warn on inconsistent annotations in `RHIC.GetArgument` and handler parameter #41489
  • Blazor Web App running using WPF using webassembly question #41488

Closed

  • Different behavior on json parsing errors in mvc and minimal apis #41459
  • Need report exception when model deserialize failed #41322
  • SignalR Java Client not working in Android 12 #40874
  • Update Blazor workshop to .NET 6 #32226
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #41415
  • Element’s attribute change causes performance lack when hosted the application in US region and accessed in India or Brazil location #41393
  • Api Suggestion [ViewModel ] Attribute for for poco tags #41423
  • Blazor css-isolation and js-isolation via rendertreebuilder #41450
  • Serving RCL Static Assets with the _content/LibraryName prefix #41480
  • "@ref" can not get correct value #41469
  • Perf improvement: json #41403
  • Blazor route parameters not work with custom type #41467
  • NET5 - Does Blazor + WASM + Client-Side-Only (No Server) support EF + Sqlite + InMemory? #34141
    Backlog
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • .NET 6 - blazor-hotreload.js is missing from _framework folder #35194
    Discussions
  • DefaultHttpContextFactory.Create(IFeatureCollection) does not set DefaultHttpContext._active #40705
    7.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix Component Governance alerts #41501
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41500
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Support minimal APIs & program/main together in Web API template #41499
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Unquarantine component E2E tests that were quarantined because of an SDK isse #41494
    area-blazor
  • Add support for JSON transcoding unannotated methods #41493
    area-grpc
  • Determine next log file number from directory on first run #41492
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Only load bcrypt.dll on Windows #41487
    area-dataprotection

Merged

  • Fix Component Governance alerts #41485
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Update branding to 6.0.6 #41496
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 3.1.26 #41495
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41458
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Unify initialization in DefaultHttpContextFactory #41333
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/3.1] Fix component government bugs #41160
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Error when Http/1.0 attempts to upgrade #40006
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix diff checks for ContentRoot and WebRoot #41182
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • release/6.0 port of abort handling #41360
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Add rule to seal internal and private types #41457
    area-infrastructure
  • Spruce up OpenApiSchema generation #41468
    area-web-frameworks
  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • fix allocation issue caused by ordering of MVC result executors for Task results #41108
    area-mvc
  • Don't allocate method name strings in protocol #41465
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Landing page improvements #3039
    .NET 7.0

Closed

  • Failed to find runtime module (libcoreclr.dylib), 0x80004002 #2997

  • Update the container tooling docs now that we support direct downloads #2477

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ImageButton visual state does not reset #6676

  • Why StackLayout has to be split into 3 different controls? #6766

  • CollectionView with Header or Footer throws: The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #5332

  • Working alternative for PlatformImage for Maui.Graphics.IImage for Windows? #6742
  • DisplayActionSheet Inside a Shell Does Not Work on Windows #6639

    6.0.300
  • Content Page- Disappearing event not fire #6722

    6.0.300
  • [Android] SwipeView as CollectionView itemtemplate black rendering #4119
    6.0.300
  • Native controls are not rendered in some cases when BlazorWebView is present on Android #4009
    6.0.300-servicing
  • BackgroundColor not changed #5380
    6.0.300
  • Cannot use StaticResources for resources in App.xaml #3878
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Dependency injection breaks AppThemeBinding #5868
    6.0.300
  • Invoke Platform Code Works For One Platform Only, But Flagged As Wrong For The Two Others #5294
    6.0.300-servicing
  • New Maui solution, AppDelegate intellisense issues #4726
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance degraded when migrated from EF2 to EF6 #27939
  • TypeInitialization_Type, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.EvaluatableExpressionFilter: Could not find property 'Now' on type 'System.DateTimeOffset' when trimmed #27936
  • Query: Consider having predicate on SqlEnumerableExpression so providers can integrate it accordingly #27935
  • Metadata: Add support for adding UDF which are aggregate #27934
  • Lift GroupBy aggregate chain with navigation expansion into aggregate term #27933

Closed

  • OnModelCreating(ModelBuilder modelBuilder) is triggered twice by dbContext.Database.EnsureCreated() #27921

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27944
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27943
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Allow to set provider value comparer when configuring value conversion #27942
  • Update test instructions and remove 2.2 #27938

Merged

  • Update branding to 3.1.26 #27940
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.6 #27941
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.6
  • [Typo] Cleanup trailing end tag in documentation #27937
    auto-merge, community-contribution

Updated

  • Query: Translate aggregate over grouping element in separate pass #27931
    providers-beware
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and SQLitePCLRaw #27932
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Refactor UpdateSqlGenerator to separate select logic #27902
